评论详情: This purse is beautiful on its own. The fact it allows you to protect yourself and those with you is a huge bonus. The quality of the leather is amazing for the value of the product. It’s super light to carry and has room for all of your essentials. The adjustable strap allows anyone to be comfortable carrying.
Wonderful quality bag for conceal carry. The zipper quality it very strong and the bag is not overly heavy. My wife loves the color and how the bag is stiff and firm.
Super cute, quality material, lots of space, and hides your pew pew lol Highly recommend!
Bag overall is super cute and bigger than expected. But came damaged. Will be replacing. So I will post another when that happens.
Bought as a gift for my wife. She's used it just at a month and 2 days after the return window closed, the bottom is coming undone. Will try to argue for a replacement but not optimistic.

评论概述: Pretty but not worth the price
评论详情: For and $80 bag it starts folding in less than a week. The strap was also super cheap feeling and I was afraid to carry the bag with it. Holster area was decently made but Velcro was only on one side. I believe that’s why the purse folds, from the weight of the pistol. Anyway I sent it back for a smaller bag from browning
I have had my purse a little less than a year i love it but its breaking already and i have only carried a handful of time
Very disappointed in the quality.  It is already starting to tear/peel around the bottom.
Color is spot on, tons of space. My only issue was one of the zippers for the firearm compartment won't lock, it's stuck.
It’s pretty and well made but once your gun is inside the pocket the purse falls over.  My gun isn’t that heavy either
This purse is big and wonderful. I just love it. Perfect for your gun and everything else you need to pack.
Very nice and worth the money! Very roomy. Love it

评论概述: It was okay. However, I did return it.
评论详情: Holster didn’t stay up inside the compartment with gun inside. It made it heavy. Very big purse, though I like big, but this was just a little too big for me. Didn’t like how the crossbody strap looked on the purse when attaching it.
It didn’t come with the holster

I really wanted to like this purse I wanted to love it because I don't like floppy purses in this one was nice and firm stands up nice however. The shoulder strap seems to be an afterthought there are no side hooks for this You're supposed to hook it to the handle of the purse. The handle of the purse itself is short and very hard to put up over your shoulder. This makes using the concealed weapon compartment very difficult. Loved the color but hated the working of the purse had to send it back.
Very nice quality. Large

评论概述: Large without being bulky, Very Durable
评论详情: I took a chance after reading the other reviews that said it was just a bit too big. I like carrying a big bag but not a beach bag. This I feel is a perfectly good size for my needs. I do agree the interior pockets are just a hair small (really gotta jam your hands in to reach the bottoms). I think an additional divider or interior or even back pocket would be nice also. THAT SAID: It's incredibly sturdy feeling, and the quality seems fantastic. I've already gotten several compliments on the bag. It's classy looking. I like that there's a R or L option for where to put your pew pew, and the zipper lock is AWESOME. I'm someone that usually carries a Coach bag, and I find this quality comparable for a fraction of the price. I definitely recommend this bag.

评论概述: I wanted to love this bag...
评论详情: And I did at first. It's just over 2 months old and already falling apart. I work from home so most days my purse doesn't even move. Extremely disappointed.
Strap broke after 1 month of use....ive had purses that i paid $20 for last longer... smh
Very beautiful bag, love the color and style, the concealed pocket seemed great. But it was so big it was like a suitcase so I had to return.

I found this purse to be way to heavy to carry once it’s intended contents were fastened into the side pockets, which DON’T look, even though they have a key…(just decorative) hanging on each side.  VERY difficult to quickly withdraw needed contents from the side zippered compartments.
Really disappointed I just received my bag today and it looks like this ?.

I really wished I could love this purse, I carries it for approx a week, trying to get used to it and sadly couldn't. It's very large, very stiff, bulky. The included holster was a great fit and sat secure in its place, but just everything else sadly didn't.

Nice looking and love the color. Do wish it was available with silver hardware, the gold seems a bit flashy. Sturdy and works as advertised. A bit bigger (more like a briefcase) than anticipated but that's my fault for not checking measurements.
This is a large purse; but is very sturdy, and the first one I've had that the cw doesn't slide down and make the purse fall to one side.  It has so much room inside too!  I love it!
Actually is a nice purse. Good size, I thought it was smaller, but no. My wife love's it!

评论概述: Good for purpose but qlty not the best
评论详情: Concealed area is fine and my handgun fits without any issues. Purse is bigger and bulkier than anticipated. Also the purse handle SQUEAKS so loud! That is my biggest complaint. I use it because I’d rather not have my gun loose in a purse but I guess I need to find one with nicer quality material (aka quieter).
This was a bit big but other then that it was just what I was looking for. No one ever knows that I am carrying...

This is a great fashionable purse. However, it does not fit a Springfield Hellcat… but it can fit Beretta APX A1 if you break it in a bit, and remove 2-3 stitches. It swallows a 380 though in my opinion.

I love this satchel bag!! It is very well made and the color is true to what you see! I can easily conceal my hand gun and love the locking zippers too! My sister spends hundreds on handbags and is jealous of mine!!

评论概述: Too big but cute and it’s heavy
评论详情: Cute and heavy too big
Bought as a gift for my mom and she loves it, thick material and great for concealed carry. The purse part is also a great size not too big but also not too small!

I love the look of the purse but the functionality of it didn't make sense to me. I want to be able to slip my hand in without having to unlock my purse first. I would prefer to have a way to hold it on the inside of the purse. I have a purse made from gun totin mamas and it's perfect in the way it holds my gun and if I need it, its easily accessible. Also, in this purse, the gun slipped from it's original position by the end of the day. Maybe the Velcro isnt strong? Idk but I immediately went back to my gun totin mamas purse.
This is more for fashion than function. It’s legit like a small suitcase, I swear
Was as expected
Very nice purse I paid over 200.00 for my last one similar to this one. Color is awesome.
Love the size, durability and sleekness of this purse! Holster Velcro's to the inside pocket. Very safe!
Was really roomy and sturdy. Definitely recommend this Bag !
The holster stays put when you draw. I returned another conceal carry purse because the holster came out with the gun. It is also roomy, but I wish it had more pockets/compartments.
Very sturdy and so nice looking. The camel color is stylish. And the stiffness helps with not sagging the purse due to the weight of a loaded firearm.

The only nice thing about this purse is the size. Very cheaply made. One of the zippers where the conceal pouch is doesn't work. So in case of emergency this purse wouldn't work.  You would think that these items would be checked before sending out if they work properly or not. Just the material itself not good. DONT RECOMMEND AS A CONCEAL WEAPON PURSE
The purse itself is great however it was missing the holster and Velcro strips as advertised. Too much of a hassle to return due to that but not thrilled about it.
I love this purse. Quality made and everything fits great!
When I received the purse it had a crease on the back side of purse. (Concealed side) less than 3 weeks the purse collapsed and wouldn't stand up. So frustrating.

评论概述: Love this purse, but it does NOT hold its shape.
评论详情: I loved the look of this purse. I wanted a purse that was sturdy enough to stand (not slouch) on its own. I bought it December of 2021. It was bending on the bottom within 2 weeks of purchase. Very disappointed.
I liked the purse however there is what looks like a black ink spot on one of the handles?
I enjoy this bag so much! The only thing is that it does sag a bit when your handgun is in it.
Great value for the price, shipped quickly, and was all that the supplier described. Appears to be of great quality!
Nice Quality but too big for me if you like large purses it will be perfect for you
This purse is awesome. I have a glock 43 and it fits nicely, and the purse does not sag.

评论概述: Nice bag and great customer service!
评论详情: This is a very nice large bag. I especially like the ability to lock the compartments.  I had an issue with my bag after 9 months of use. Contacted the seller & sent photos. They responded very quickly, apologized for inconvenience and sent me a replacement bag within a week. No charge. That is great customer service! I recommend this bag and this seller.

评论概述: Firmness and sides not standing up on concealed carry purse
评论详情: Firmness and Sides not standing up, oversized on concealed carry bag. I would have returned but missed cut off date due to being sick. Only carried one time and this happened. Would not recommend. I would return if I could.

评论概述: Bigger than expected.  Shipping was slow. Haven’t had it lo see how durable.
评论详情: Color is beautiful
It’s not as sturdy as I thought it would be and way bigger than I expected
My wife was very happy with this purse for her birthday. Roomy interior, and it keeps her Glock close at hand at all times.
Love it! Cute, durable and is great for CW
Amazing bag. My gun fits perfectly and I love that it doesn’t fall over!

I really wanted a leather purse but none of those came in a style I like. However, this purse is very high quality even though it isn't leather.  The color, which I call camel, is rich and goes through the material, not just sprayed on. I have a lot of stuff to carry & I like to be organized so I put one of those pocketed organizers in the bottom & I'm good to go. The zippers work well. I've received several compliments on my bag, all from ladies who I know spend $$ on leather bags.  Call me a happy customer!
Love this purse, but it can get heavy quickly! I would purchase again, if needed!

The purse was exactly as stated in product description. I receive numerous compliments every time I carry it. I also love the fact I can carry my own holster and use the Velcro strap that came with the purse. I will definitely purchase more in the future.

This purse is a very cute but way to big. I read all the reviews and really didn't believe when people said it was a little to big because honestly that's what I wanted I thought. This purse is way to big. I joke around and say it is my suitcase. The purse also leans because of my gun. I have a small 9mm glock which shouldn't effect it but the purse just lays on its side on the floor.
Awesome my wife loved it

The decorative lock on the front of the purse is backwards and no way to turn it around.  I know that I am the only one that notices, however I am the only one that carries it. I wish there was a way to take it off or turn it around.  The OCD in me notices the seam. Other side NO SEAM. smh.
Had this purse just over 1 month.  The seam has already torn and the bag has begun to fold.  Not worth it for the price. The leather seems quite durable but the stitching is very cheap.
Item received with broken strap, it was not sewn properly. Refund requested and received but now the item is only available at an increased price.  Pitiful.
I love it when I got it, but almost 2 weeks of using it and one of the handles is coming apart.
Very sad that I have had this purse 4 months and it’s falling apart.  Totally love the purse but it’s coming apart and I can’t get ahold of vendor since there are no more available. ☹️☹️☹️

Beautiful purse in itself, but for the price, it was supposed to "includes a holster with hook and loop attachment for safe carry." That was the sole purpose of purchasing this as a gift for my daughter @ Christmas... So that she could safely carry her concealed handgun in it. She & I were very disappointed.
This has been the worst purse I have ever gotten. Almost all of the trim has come off, starting from the first week that I got it. Do not recommend this
Fits my gun perfect. !! Could smash my puppy or baby if I had one in there ! Awesome

评论概述: Main zipper does not zip closed
评论详情: Beautiful purse, but the main zipper to close the purse does not zip closed.  Very disappointing!

I initially loved this purse. It was everything I wanted in a carry conceal purse. Heavy duty, lots of compliments, locking compartment to lock my weapon in the purse. I purchased on 10/18/19 by 11/28/2019, Thanksgiving day, the strapped popped off, while I was out of town. This was the only purse I brought with me on the trip. So very disappointing...I was carrying the small version of the Glock 9MM, not a heavy weapon. In little over a month from date of purchase the strap had snapped.
I love the purse but the clasp on the shoulder strap is stuck in the open position which makes it useless. Otherwise, the purse is well made and gorgeous
This purse is beautiful and extremely roomy and functional!  However,  I have a small frame and it was just too large.  I  really  wanted it to work because it's  truly a beautiful bag.

This is a beautiful, classy conceal carry purse and when I first received it, I loved it.  Within the first two months of daily use, the side that holds my gun started to break down and not hold its shape.  I carry a Lady Smith .38, not excessively large or heavy, so I'm very disappointed that this bag doesn't hold up for its intended purpose.  Would not purchase again.

I had the same purse, different color, from two years ago. They upgraded to include a holster (with outside Velcro) and the zip pocket to have Velcro as well. Love the purse, I get so many compliments - before they even know it’s a CC bag!

Have had MANY comments on this purse as to how attractive it is.  If some of them only knew.  My 9mm fits nicely and stays secure.  I have taken the purse to the range to work with it.  I have unzipped one side while walking when I felt less than safe for easier access.  However, this works well when on the body carry is not always practical.

Perfect purse for you having your CWP. Very stylish it is a good size but its perfect for me especially having a toddler I have room to put her things in it as well. I like how it has locks on the zipper area where you can place your gun. It can pass as a regular purse not unless someone who deals with CWP may know what the purse actually is.
I LOVE MY NEW CC PURSE !! Locks up gun area with 4 keys !! Not just for decorations. Completely worth it . Purse  Came with a Wallet & Soft Holster which Velcros Gun in place ... Color is Stone

评论概述: Not the greatest for the price
评论详情: I have used this purse for about a month now and the strap already broke and the bottom is wearing.... I am a little disappointed
Birthday gift for the wife. She loved it!

I love this purse. So happy i ordered it. Great quality i love the stone color. And i love that's it's big. It fits my 9mm s&w m&p sheild perfect in the regular holster they provided. Its perfect for all my stuff and i can throw my toddlers travel potty seat and extra clothes in there if i dont want to carry her book bag! Highly recommend! Family has already dropped hints of wanting one for gifts!

评论概述: Looks like a luxury designer purse, but it has a secret!
评论详情: This purse is absolutely stunning. It looks like a designer bag. I got the Stone color and it is an incredibly versatile shade. I ended up not using the wallet because it was a little small for what I normally carry and just a little stiff.  The only tiny drawback I can find with it is that it is heavy before you put anything in it. It is extremely heavy with my phone, makeup, a couple of lipsticks, keys wallet and my A5 planner, which is a must. Then, I had to add the Ruger LCP2 and extra magazine. Thank goodness it's small and light.  I do really appreciate the ability to lock the zippers, as I have a grandson and am often around other children.  I thought about returning it, but it is too gorgeous, and I think even if it doesn't end up being an everyday carry bag (I really prefer to carry on my body), this purse would be perfect for an occasion where you don't want to flip your dress over your head to get to your gun. I'll probably eventually buy it in black.
Love everything about it

Wife loves it, high quality and completely concealed. CV comes with different options and attachments to securely and safely fit and conceal various size handguns. Most importantly my wife now feels safer being out by herself because she works at night.

评论概述: Great purse but the corners are creasing
评论详情: Picked this purse for the rigid sides. I wanted something that would hold all of my necessities but not soft allowing the contents to leave a revealing impression. After a few weeks, the corners began to give and crease, losing the rigidity. Hoping I can find a solution before it gets worse. Still, the purse has plenty of space to fit what I need in the side pocket, and ample space in the main pocket for all the things I lug around daily. Another thing about the side pocket, Velcro holds well but had to find something to hold my holster firmly in place to it didn’t fall out and become loose in the pocket.  Other than that, love the purse for daily use.
Purchased for my daughter. She loves it

This bag is way to large for me, it says free returns, they charging me almost $20? I need someone to look at this. I would like a different purse, but not by saying free return & charging me  almost $20.
Looks good, well made with exception of locks. Cannot get them to work.
Very well made.
5 star customer service. I received my bag and it did not have the shoulder strap with it.  They're sending me a new one, the purse is awesome and great look and quality!

评论概述: Holds her 9mm well and is easy to access
评论详情: My wife loves her purse. It is still holding up well and was bought in January. Holds her 9mm well and is easy to access. She does not use the shoulder strap. The shorter straps are perfect and keeps the purse and gun close to body.

Received my purse yesterday. I did read the reviews about the size and I agree it is a little large; however satisfied that it will hold either one of the two CCW 9mm's that I have. There is one downfall, on the bottom of the purse it looks like it was rubbed against something and has a minor flaw, but overall a good purchase.  Will update after a few months of use.
Real big! I can fit my German Shepherd in it

评论概述: Cheaper than ones at Calebas and fair quay
评论详情: Price and working fine.
This purse is exactly what I had in mind!!! The leather is thick enough to conceal my weapon properly

评论概述: Appears to be very good qaulity. Holster works well with my Glock 42
评论详情: (6-27/18) Just got it. Feels very heavy duty/durable and looks like real leather. The holster fits my Glock 42 just fine. Ill update this review after ive had it a few months.
LOVE this purse.  I get a lot of complements on it.  Cannot conceal carry at work but use the purse day to day and it holds up!

Seems like a nice quality bag but too soon to really tell. Fits my 380 and 9mm very nicely. Almost sent it back because it is a bit bigger than I'm used to carrying but not be on "prime" meant shipping both ways not refunded so I'll get used to it.
